data.title: ToDo App
data.summary: A stereotypical todo list application.  Allows you to create, delete, toggle, and modify your todo items for the day.  It even comes with a built-in completion bar!

data.title: TCP Tic Tac Toe
data.summary: Allows you to play Tic-Tac-Toe over a TCP connection!  It all runs in the command line with an interactive terminal.  Play both sides yourself, or invite a friend to come play with you!

data.title: Chris Wolf Design
data.summary: The codebase for the webpage you're looking at now!  If you'd like to see how I've generated this page, come take a look!  I hope you have enjoyed browsing my page and I hope to hear from you soon!
